snippet.title: Out of Hands - Indiegame Official Trailer | Release on April 22nd
snippet.description:
Out of Hands is a bizarre deckbuilding RPG game that blends video-collage graphics with gripping psychological horror. Uncover the twisted truths hidden in this surreal nightmare—or collapse under their crushing weight. As fractured memories consume your sanity, your very humanity will contort into something... 

🎮 FREE DEMO available soon on March 14th
🔔Out of Hands officially releases on April 22nd
✨Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/18...

Follow us👇
Discord:   https://discord.com/invite/3sRHKMYjcq
Twitter:    https://x.com/PlayOutofHands
Instagram:   https://www.instagram.com/playoutofhands/
TIKTOK:     https://www.tiktok.com/@out_of_hands_
